column1: Master of Science in Design and Innovation
column5: Do you want to upskill in the area of Design and Innovation while working?This is an exciting new Masters programme designed for people from varied backgrounds who want to develop their innovation, design, management and leadership skills.It was developed by a cross-disciplinary team in ATU Galway, using expertise from Engineering, Design and Creative Arts, and Business led by the Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering.The Masters is delivered primarily online, using a blended learning approach, and is 100% project-based with no exams.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
